title: Which Battle Boss skin do you like the most?
body:
Which 4 of the battle boss skins do you appeal more? 

Blitzcrank, Ziggs, Brand or Malzahar?

Veigar is the final boss, I don't know if that is included in the battle boss skin section...

replies.body:
Of course Veigar counts, hes been featured in almost every arcade ad up to now. My order:
Black Mage 
Bomberman
Crystal Mage
Fireman
Crane Game

All of em. In order likely veig, malzahar, brand, blitz, ziggs. 

Like em all just wish the team was more metaized for legit game fun. Can't really win many games as 5 ap.

If malz was still a jg you could do Ziggs bot, brand sup, veig mid, blitz top, malz jg.

You would need void staffs all around though.
I can jungle with brand eyyyy

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PLX8r4jl,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-08-12T10:27:47.222+0000)
>
> If malz was still a jg you could do Ziggs bot, brand sup, veig mid, blitz top, malz jg.
> 
> You would need void staffs all around though.

Yeah, I miss old malz and his armor pen zerg rush tactics. At least we have the memories.

Pfft, that wasn't old Malz. Old Malz was before they ever reworked him in the first place and I could go spell vamp masteries and quints, drop my E on a wave, and basically always have a health pot on, the mana gain from a ring and his E was enough for sustain, and his base stats were high enough I could 1v3 push to inhib turret without going B.

Then you buy whatever items you wanted. One time I built an infinity edge and static shiv on my first B, and I only went B because our Wukong kept bugging me about it XD Of course, AP was best on him though, I just did that because we were so far ahead.

> [{quoted}](name=BestJhinUniverse,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PLX8r4jl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-12T10:25:42.246+0000)
>
> All of em. In order likely veig, malzahar, brand, blitz, ziggs. 
> 
> Like em all just wish the team was more metaized for legit game fun. Can't really win many games as 5 ap.

Yeah... unfortunately. AP items aren't so perfect at this time tbh. Let's return deathfire grasp and return the 5 AP team!

Blitz's was made earlier, so he doesn't have a voice change

But his rainbow-y ult makes up for it
